set.name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate Collector Boosters

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Abdel Adrian, Gorion's Ward enters the battlefield, exile any number of other nonland permanents you control until Abdel Adrian leaves the battlefield. Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each permanent exiled this way. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of tokens you created this turn. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target tapped creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You have traveled to many places, over mountains and across seas, but a new journey always calls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks, it gains double strike until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You carry the security of Baldur's Gate on your shoulders, and you welcome the weight of responsibility.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "Creature tokens you control get +2/+2."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your family needed a farmer, so you tilled. Your town needed a fighter, so you trained. When your people needed a leader, you knew what you had to do.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would put one or more counters on a creature or planeswalker you control or on yourself, put that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent or player instead. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each tapped creature you control, then untap them. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "When this creature enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. For each opponent who does, you gain protection from that player until your next turn." (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything controlled by that player.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power. Whenever Rasaad yn Bashir attacks, if you have the initiative, double the toughness of each creature you control until end of turn. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks a player, if no opponent has more life than that player, for each opponent, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token that's tapped and attacking that opponent."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You've always been happiest fighting for a cause you believe in alongside loyal comrades.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you attack, up to one target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. Return that creature to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "When this creature enters or leaves the battlefield, draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You love the smell of dusty tomes, the flicker of candles during late-night reading, and the old texts that bring to life the scholars who have come before.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "Room abilities of dungeons you own trigger an additional time."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You're driven not by a lust for gold or baubles, but by the thrill of danger and the excitement of the unknown.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you create a 1/1 blue Faerie Dragon creature token with flying."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fey energy clings to you, a shimmering reminder of your otherworldly travels.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, you may cast up to one target card of the other type from your graveyard. If a spell cast from your graveyard this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) At the beginning of your end step, if you have the initiative, draw a card. Draw another card if you've completed a dungeon. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Dragon spells and artifact spells as though they had flash. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sure, you can get one elsewhere ... if you want a knockoff that'll break the first time you use it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "{2}{U}: This creature becomes a copy of another target creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You see your next disguise in every stranger's smile.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks a player, if no opponent has more life than that player, this creature can't be blocked this turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You were born at sea, and your legs are steadiest when the waves are rowdiest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance {T}: Add an amount of {C} equal to Vhal, Candlekeep Researcher's toughness. This mana can't be spent to cast spells from your hand. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Volo enters the battlefield, create Volo's Journal, a legendary colorless artifact token with hexproof and "Whenever you cast a creature spell, note one of its creature types that hasn't been noted for this artifact." {2}, {T}: Draw a card for each creature type noted for target permanent you control named Volo's Journal. Choose a Background

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever an artifact or creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You give your clients what they want at a fair price. What happens after that is none of your concern.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks a player, if no opponent has more life than that player, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. It gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your skill, dexterity, and moral flexibility make you a valuable asset to your guild.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have menace and "This creature gets +X/+0, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard." (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You've never cared much for laws or authority, especially when they get in your way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own get +3/+3 and have flying, deathtouch, "Ward - Pay 3 life," and "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You embrace power at any cost, and if it consumes you, so be it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace At the beginning of your end step, if you have the initiative, create a Treasure token. Create three of those tokens instead if you've completed a dungeon. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's end step, if no permanents left the battlefield this turn, that player loses X life, where X is Sarevok's power. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "The first time you would draw a card each turn, instead look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your graveyard and the other back on top of your library. Then draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most see the Mad Mage as a deranged menace, but you recognize the genius behind his paranoia

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw X cards, where X is that creature's power. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Shar's will shall be done. As sure as night will fall."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice another creature or an artifact: For each opponent, you mill a card, then return that card from your graveyard to your hand unless that player pays 3 life. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.) Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard, return a creature card at random from your graveyard to your hand. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever Amber Gristle O'Maul attacks, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw a card for each player being attacked. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "At the beginning of your end step, if a source you controlled dealt 5 or more damage this turn, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You know that mighty dracoliches will one day rule over this world. For you, that day can't come soon enough.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Ganax, Astral Hunter or another Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks a player, if no opponent has more life than that player, you create two Treasure tokens." (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your discerning eye for value makes you nearly impossible to swindle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you attack, you may sacrifice another creature or an artifact. If you do, create a 4/1 black Skeleton creature token with menace that's tapped and attacking. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you attack, if it's the first combat phase of the turn, untap all attacking creatures. They gain first strike until end of turn. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell's mana value. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her hunger for power consumes what the fire cannot.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, goad target creature that player controls." (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The last thing anyone would describe you as is shy. You love the spotlight, and it loves you back.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "{1}, Sacrifice another creature or an artifact: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your harsh upbringing on the streets of the city left you crafty, resilient, and wise beyond your years.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. This creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that card's mana value. You may play that card this turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only thing you love more than a good drink is a good fight. Luckily, one usually follows the other.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would roll one or more dice, instead roll that many dice plus one and ignore the lowest roll. Whenever you roll one or more dice, put a +1/+1 counter on Wyll, Blade of Frontiers. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "The first Dragon spell you cast each turn costs {2} less to cast."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You were on a wayward path until Bahamut showed you that power and kindness can unite beneath the same banner.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "At the beginning of your end step, if a creature card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, create two tapped 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You've always preferred the company of animals to people.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Whenever Erinis, Gloom Stalker attacks, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: Until end of turn, target token you control becomes a green Bear creature with base power and toughness 4/4 in addition to its other colors and types. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks a player, if no opponent has more life than that player, another target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is this creature's power."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You're a born explorer, happiest forging your way through the untamed wilds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tokens you control have "{T}: Add {G}." Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Harpers' movement grows, but it needs sunlight to blossom. We can be that light."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have "This creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it" and "Other creatures you control enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on them."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You never thought "rations" was an appropriate term for the feasts you prepare for your party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you own have base power and toughness 10/10 and are Giants in addition to their other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your parents taught you that strength can be nurtured and honed, no matter one's size.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Skanos Dragonheart attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among other Dragons you control and Dragon cards in your graveyard. Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Vigilance, reach, trample Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand and put a number of time counters on it equal to its mana value. It gains "When the last time counter is removed from this card, if it's exiled, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you cast a creature spell this way, it gains haste until end of turn." Then remove a time counter from each other card you own in exile.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch, lifelink At the beginning of your end step, choose one - • Feed - Target opponent loses life equal to the amount of life they lost this turn. • Friends - You gain life equal to the amount of life you gained this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice up to three permanents: If there were three or more card types among the sacrificed permanents, each opponent loses 3 life, you gain 3 life, and you draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Better the cold night than her warm hospitality.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, Bane, Lord of Darkness has indestructible. Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, target opponent may have you draw a card. If they don't, you may put a creature card with equal or lesser toughness from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, Bhaal, Lord of Murder has indestructible. Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and goad it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Cadira, Caller of the Small deals combat damage to a player, for each token you control, create a 1/1 white Rabbit creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She roams the border between wilderness and civilization, protecting those who need it most.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you attack, spells you cast from exile this turn cost {X} less to cast, where X is the number of players being attacked. Exile the top X cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a ghoul-eat-you world out there. Follow my orders if you want to survive."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player draws their second card during their turn, you draw a card. Whenever a player casts their second spell during their turn, you create a 2/2 white Knight creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ambition has a price in Baldur's Gate, and it is paid to the Council.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, another target creature you control gains haste and myriad until end of turn. (Whenever it attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste You may activate abilities of other creatures you control as though those creatures had haste. {T}: When you next activate an ability that isn't a mana ability this turn by spending four or more mana to activate it, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your end step, choose a player. They put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. Choose a second player to draw a card. Then choose a third player to create two Treasure tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever you cast an Adventure spell, you may copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are safest in Candlekeep, Abdel, but I cannot keep you from the world forever."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {T}, Sacrifice an artifact creature: Create two Treasure tokens. {T}, Sacrifice a noncreature artifact: Create two 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, target opponent gains control of up to one target creature you control. Put two +1/+1 counters on it and tap it. It's goaded for the rest of the game and it gains "This creature can't be sacrificed." (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.) Whenever a creature you own but don't control attacks, you draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Kagha, Shadow Archdruid attacks, it gains deathtouch until end of turn. Mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.) Once during each of your turns, you may play a land or cast a permanent spell from among cards in your graveyard that were put there from your library this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast Dragon spells from the top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Would you like a song of wing-wind and fire, or one of gentle heartbeats atop a golden hoard?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast an Adventure or Dragon spell, Lozhan, Dragons' Legacy deals damage equal to that spell's mana value to any target that isn't a commander.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She channels myth and memory into waves of deadly arcane force.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, create a Treasure token for each creature that died this turn. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Welcome to the Wandering Emporium. Feel free to browse the bazaar. We have everything a lost soul could want, need, or afford."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an enchanted creature attacks one of your opponents, it gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. Whenever an Aura you control is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, exile it. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast that card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, ward {2} Whenever another nontoken Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, create a token that's a copy of it, except the token isn't legendary.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ward {X}, where X is the number of experience counters you have. At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, you get an experience counter. Creatures you control get +1/+0 for each experience counter you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, Myrkul, Lord of Bones has indestructible. Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's an enchantment and loses all other card types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell, you may put it on the bottom of its owner's library. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then put all revealed cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order. This ability triggers only once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Ward - Pay 9 life. Whenever Nine-Fingers Keene deals combat damage to a player, look at the top nine cards of your library. You may put a Gate card from among them onto the battlefield. Then if you control nine or more Gates, put the rest into your hand. Otherwise, put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oji, the Exquisite Blade enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and scry 2. Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, exile up to one target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They walk the Path of Kensei with perfect balance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control with a mana ability gets +2/+2. Whenever a creature you control with a mana ability attacks, untap it. Whenever you cast a spell, if at least seven mana was spent to cast it, untap target creature. It gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Other Demons, Devils, Imps, and Tieflings you control get +1/+1 and have lifelink. At the beginning of each end step, if a creature card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch When Rilsa Rael, Kingpin enters the battlefield, you take the initiative. Whenever you attack, target attacking creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. If you've completed a dungeon, that creature also gets +5/+0 and gains first strike and menace until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Thrakkus the Butcher attacks, double the power of each Dragon you control until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Somehow he never seems to run out of meat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {2}, {T}: When you next cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single opponent or a single permanent an opponent controls this turn, for each other opponent, choose that player or a permanent they control, copy that spell, and the copy targets the chosen player or permanent.

property.name: Rules
Artist
Rules
Rules
Artist
Rules
